title: I‚Äôve always loved this game!! But‚Ä¶
text: I don‚Äôt think I need to explain myself much, I love this game, always have since 2020 lol. But my brother and I have a phone and iPad hooked up to the same Apple ID, and it‚Äôs pretty annoying that there‚Äôs absolutely no other way to make a separate account besides making an entirely new Apple ID for Game Center, as it marks us as a duplicate login. It would be wonderful if we could just use email accounts to log in instead so siblings/family members like us don‚Äôt have to put up with this. It‚Äôs much easier to make another Gmail or something than logging out of one of the devices entirely (possibly losing other apps‚Äô progress along the way)üò≠ If you happen to see this InnerSloth, thanks for reading, and I really hope you take this into consideration!ü•πüôèüèª
